meanings.sent1: The dark clouds were a foretokened warning of the coming storm.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's stern look foretokened trouble for the misbehaving student.
meanings.sent3: The barking dog foretokened the arrival of the mail carrier.
meanings.sent4: The sudden drop in temperature foretokened the onset of winter.
meanings.sent5: The eerie silence in the forest foretokened an approaching danger.

meanings.definition: A sign or omen of a future event.
meanings.sent1: The black cat crossing their path was seen as a foretokened of bad luck.
meanings.sent2: Finding a four-leaf clover is often considered a foretokened of good fortune.
meanings.sent3: Seeing a shooting star is a foretokened that your wish might come true.
meanings.sent4: The old legend spoke of a foretokened that would herald the return of the lost king.
meanings.sent5: The sudden appearance of a rainbow was a foretokened of hope after the storm.
